trans-unit.source: Provides a collection of values that describe a profile property.
trans-unit.target: 提供的值，用于描述配置文件属性的集合。

trans-unit.source: You use the ProfilePropertyMetadata class to retrieve information about a profile property when you access profiles through the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService> class.
trans-unit.target: ProfilePropertyMetadata 类用于检索有关配置文件属性的信息，当<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService>类</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService>通过访问配置文件

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the name and type of the property, whether it is read-only, whether it can be accessed by users who have not been authenticated, and the default value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检索的名称和类型的属性，无论它是只读的无论它可由尚未验证，用户和默认值。

trans-unit.source: An application can take the appropriate actions based on these values, such as not trying to set a read-only property.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以采取相应的措施基于这些值，例如不会尝试设置只读属性。

trans-unit.source: To access the ProfilePropertyMetadata object from an application that is compatible with the Windows Communication Framework (WCF), use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.GetPropertiesMetadata%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要从使用 Windows Communication Framework (WCF) 兼容的应用程序访问 ProfilePropertyMetadata 对象，请使用<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.GetPropertiesMetadata%2A>方法的<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService>类。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.GetPropertiesMetadata%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user does not have to be logged on to retrieve the ProfilePropertyMetadata object because the metadata for profile properties is not specific to a user's profile property values.
trans-unit.target: 用户不必登录才能检索 ProfilePropertyMetadata 对象，因为配置文件属性的元数据并不特定于用户的配置文件属性值。

trans-unit.source: The values in the ProfilePropertyMetadata class are set in the Web.config file in the element of the section when the property is defined.
trans-unit.target: ProfilePropertyMetadata 类中的将值设置的部分元素中的 Web.config 文件中定义的属性时。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfilePropertyMetadata"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfilePropertyMetadata"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the property is available to unauthenticated users.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示属性是否可供未经身份验证的用户。

trans-unit.source: When you enable anonymous identification with settings in the element, you can set which profile properties are available to anonymous users.
trans-unit.target: 启用匿名标识，与在元素中的设置时，可以设置哪些配置文件属性可供匿名用户。

trans-unit.source: You set the AllowAnonymousAccess property in the element of the section of the Web.config file when the property is defined.
trans-unit.target: 定义的属性时，可以在 Web.config 文件的部分元素中设置 AllowAnonymousAccess 属性。

trans-unit.source: From the client application, use the AllowAnonymousAccess property to determine whether a profile property can be set for an anonymous user.
trans-unit.target: 从客户端应用程序，使用 AllowAnonymousAccess 属性以确定是否可以为匿名用户设置的配置文件属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property is available to unauthenticated users; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果属性是可供未经身份验证的用户;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置该属性的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The serialized format of the DefaultValue property is determined by the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfilePropertyMetadata.SerializeAs%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfilePropertyMetadata> class.
trans-unit.target: DefaultValue 属性的序列化的格式确定<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfilePropertyMetadata.SerializeAs%2A>属性的<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfilePropertyMetadata>类。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfilePropertyMetadata> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfilePropertyMetadata.SerializeAs%2A>

trans-unit.source: A serialized representation of the default value for the property, if a default value is defined in the Web.config file; otherwise the string "(null)".
trans-unit.target: 如果在 Web.config 文件中; 中定义默认值，则属性的默认值序列化表示形式否则为字符串"(null)"。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to an <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ExtensionDataObject"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个引用， <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ExtensionDataObject"> </xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: A reference to an object that stores extended data during deserialization operations.
trans-unit.target: 对将扩展的数据存储在反序列化操作期间的对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a profile property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示配置文件属性是只读的。

trans-unit.source: You set the IsReadOnly property in the element of the section of the Web.config file when the property is defined.
trans-unit.target: 定义的属性时，可以在 Web.config 文件的部分元素中设置的 IsReadOnly 属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the profile property is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果配置文件属性是只读的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the profile property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置配置文件属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: You set the PropertyName property in the element of the section of the Web.config file when the property is defined.
trans-unit.target: 定义的属性时，可以在 Web.config 文件的部分元素中设置 PropertyName 属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the profile property as defined in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 在 Web.config 文件中定义的配置文件属性名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates how to serialize the property value.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示如何序列化的属性值。

trans-unit.source: You set the SerializeAs property in the element of the section of the Web.config file when the property is defined.
trans-unit.target: 定义的属性时，可以在 Web.config 文件的部分元素中设置 SerializeAs 属性。

trans-unit.source: The enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the assembly-qualified name of the profile property type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置配置文件属性类型的程序集限定名称。

trans-unit.source: You set the TypeName property in the element of the section of the Web.config file when the property is defined.
trans-unit.target: 定义的属性时，可以在 Web.config 文件的部分元素中设置此 TypeName 属性。

trans-unit.source: The assembly-qualified name of the profile property type.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件属性类型的程序集限定名称。
